metadata.title: CVE-2019-16395 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: GnuCOBOL 2.2 has a stack-based buffer overflow in the cb_name() function in cobc/tree.c via crafted COBOL source code.

criterions.comment: gnucobol package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0~early~20200606-3').
